Queen Navari:
Welcome!Tell me, do You like it here in Benon?
In the world of Spirits of the Wind is a wonderful place was truly legendary.
Moving through a Spatial Rift is not passed to him without a trace, but, benon continues to dazzle with beauty. It was built so that he is not afraid of the game and leprosy Spirits of the Wind. For those who see it for the first time, he makes an indelible impression.
